Item ID3763

Fremennik blue cloaks can be bought from Yrsa's Accoutrements in western Rellekka. They can be found in eleven different colours: cyan, brown, blue, green, red, grey, yellow, teal, purple, pink, and black. These capes have the same bonuses as a normal cape.

These capes can only be bought after a player has completed The Fremennik Trials quest.

[[File:Fremennik blue cloak detail.png|left|130px]]
'''Fremennik blue cloaks''' can be bought from [[Yrsa's Accoutrements]] in western [[Rellekka]]. They can be found in eleven different colours: cyan, brown, blue, green, red, grey, yellow, teal, purple, pink, and black. These capes have the same bonuses as a normal [[cape]].

These capes can only be bought after a player has completed [[The Fremennik Trials]] quest.
